SEARCH
Package assignment1

Class FitnessTracker

java.lang.Object
assignment1.FitnessTracker
public class FitnessTracker extends Object
The FitnessTracker class represents a fitness tracking application that captures user data and calculates key metrics to evaluate fitness levels.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Luna Von Besser

  • Constructor Details

    • FitnessTracker

      public FitnessTracker(String firstName, String lastName, String gender, int stepsTaken, int caloriesBurned, int activeMinutes)
      Constructs a FitnessTracker object with the specified user data.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The first name of the user.
      lastName - The last name of the user.
      gender - The gender of the user (male or female).
      stepsTaken - The number of steps taken in a day.
      caloriesBurned - The number of calories burned in a day.
      activeMinutes - The number of active minutes in a day.

      public double weeklyAvgMinutes(int activeMinutes)
      Calculates the weekly average active minutes based on the daily active minutes.
      Parameters:
      activeMinutes - average number of active minutes by the user in a day.
      Returns:
      weekly average active minutes.

    • fitnessLevel

      public String fitnessLevel(int activeMinutes, int caloriesBurned)
      Determines the fitness level of the user based on their weekly active minutes and calories burned.
      Parameters:
      activeMinutes - average number of active minutes in a day.
      caloriesBurned - number of calories burned in a day.
      Returns:
      fitness level of the user (Active, Moderately Active, or Sedentary).

    • calculateCalorieDeficit

      public int calculateCalorieDeficit(int maintenance, int caloriesBurned)
      Calculates the daily calorie deficit or surplus based on the user's maintenance calories and calories burned.
      Parameters:
      maintenance - daily maintenance calories.
      caloriesBurned - number of calories burned in a day.
      Returns:
      daily calorie deficit or surplus

    • displayFitnessData
